title: Wednesday Post Show (3-31-21)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (3-31-21)
description:
Bobby reveals his one diva demand for American Idol. We decide whether or not it’s a diva demand or not. Bobby on the NFL now playing 17 games. Bobby also gives an update on how long until we play Morgan Wallen’s music again and the Lil Nas X shoe controversy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
